scripts.generate: ([ -f config.ts ] || yarn initialize) && [ -z "${EXAMPLE}" ] && tsc && rm -rf rendered && node bin/index.js
scripts.generate-compare: [ ! -z "${EXAMPLE}" ] && yarn run generate-example && rm -rf /tmp/base /tmp/rendered && NORMALIZE=../base OUTDIR=/tmp/base yarn run normalize && NORMALIZE=examples/${EXAMPLE}/rendered OUTDIR=/tmp/rendered yarn run normalize && diff -ru /tmp/base /tmp/rendered | colordiff | less -R
